scripts.dev:mcp: npm run build -w @izan/mcp-servers-shared -w @izan/mcp-servers-general -w @izan/mcp-servers-bing -w @izan/mcp-servers-google -w @izan/mcp-servers-namecheap && dotenv -e .env -- npm run dev -w @izan/mcp-servers
